title: About me
texts: I am a Full Stack Web Developer in my 5th year at EPITECH
My training has allowed me to acquire solid knowledge in computer science and project management.
During my course, I chose to take a gap year to join a start-up publisher of collaborative platforms and thus develop a first experience in social web.
I then spent my 4th year of study at the Technological University Dublin where I validated a double degree in IT Management while continuing to work freelance remotely.
Of a persistent and rigorous nature, I am organized and attentive to needs. I know how to quickly adapt to a technical environment, be autonomous but also exchange to progress together.
My portfolio will allow you to discover my work carried out during my student and professional course.
I will be happy to exchange with you around a new project and take on new challenges!
